item.title: Setup a Fully Private Amazon EKS on AWS Fargate Cluster
item.description: Regulated industries needs to host their workloads in most secure ways and fully private EKS on Fargate cluster attempts to solve this problem. Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
